snippet: Wednesday: Racing to photograph derelict buildings, fair weather, and a grand jury indicts the police officer who shot Akai Gurley.
abstract: Wednesday: Racing to photograph derelict buildings, fair weather, and a grand jury indicts the police officer who shot Akai Gurley.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and ANNIE CORREAL

headline.main: New York Today:  Abandoned and Vanishing Places
